entry.title: LSST-DESC, SnowCluster conference, snowboarding and conversations with cluster giants
entry.summary:
Events in 2015

The year of 2015 has been tremendously exciting. First I went to the (Large Synopytic Survey Telescope) LSST-DESC meeting with the entire Davis-LLNL crew such as Michael Schneider Craig Lage, James Jee, Andrew Bradsaw, Will Dawson and Prof. Tony Tyson. Of course, some of the coolest things were the lectures from Michael and the intro of the different cosmological probes.
